name: The Grove VR
description:
The Grove is an experience that will transport you to a small peaceful pocket of nature, that we rarely get the chance to enjoy in real life. By stepping into this Virtual Reality experience, the player will be able to discover the secrets our world has to offer.

 We are a group of 9 students with the determination to create a project that tests our skills as animators into VR. As we are the first VR-based group on the BA Animation course, we are pushing the boundaries of our course at London College of Communication.

Prepare to be submerged into the true beauty of nature with the help and power of VR. 

This is our final year project, and we hope that you enjoy it as much as we have making it.

To watch our trailer, please use the Password: Finaltrailer

Check out our website for more details - thegroveproject.wixsite.com/thegrovevr
